name: The Undying Beast
summary: There was a flash of light, a choir of glass, and the sound of sirens approaching. Then for what seemed like eternity, a black hollow void. Suddenly you found yourself within a new plane. Dead trees and fog is all that surrounds you. You hear no birds or signs of life, but strange cackles and moans sound from the distance. And then you notice out of the corner of your eye you may not be alone here.
